message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation impact on my end.
I think this is a fair deal considering the inflation impacts on both of us.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor.
Bob, time is literally money for us in this game!  My last offer was much fairer considering the inflation differences.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but we need to close this out soon.
